title: Drawing, "Female Head, Frontal View, Looking Right"
description: The present view shows a female with a square chin; almost-closed eyes under straight brows; straight nose, turned slightly upward at the tip; and full, closed lips. The center-parted hair cascades in ringlets on either side of the forehead and next to the face, stopping just below chin level. The configuration of the eyes and accompanying shading convey a sleepy expression.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Head, Frontal View, Looking Right".
21.5 x 15.1 cm (8 1/2 x 6 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-93.
